name: Aerius
description: Aerius is a puzzle game in which the objective is to clear all the colored blocks from the game area. Blocks are cleared from the game are by combining blocks of the same color. The game area consists of three large squares at the bottom of the screen and five small squares at the top. Clicking on a large square that has blocks in it will make the top most row of blocks transfer to the squares at the to of the screen, the player may then choose in which large square the block(s) at the top shall transfer to. underneath each large square are two arrows and if they are enabled they allow the player to turn the area around, left to right and top to bottom.
